articles.author: Alexander Wong
articles.title: AstraZeneca Second Dose: Should I Get The Same Vaccine or Choose Pfizer or Moderna?
articles.description:
Alexander Wong
Coronavirus, Canada
 
Evidence is mounting to support a mixing and matching approach with AstraZeneca followed by Pfizer being at least as good (if not better) than giving two doses of the same vaccine.
People in Canada whose first dose of COVI…
articles.content: People in Canada whose first dose of COVID-19 vaccine was AstraZeneca have a choice to make: They can either choose one of the mRNA vaccines (Pfizer or Moderna) or another dose of AstraZeneca for the… [+8056 chars]

articles.title: Anti-Israel activists dupe Canadian medical student societies

articles.title: 'Vaxxed and waxed, baby!': Summer heats up for single-dosed singles - Dawson Creek Mirror
